summary: The module adapts pairwise metrics from the MetricsReloaded library to MONAI's cumulative‑iteration metric interface, offering wrappers for binary and categorical metrics with configurable background handling, reduction across batches/channels/elements, and optional reporting of the number of valid (non‑NaN) values.
business_intent: Enable seamless integration of external evaluation metrics into MONAI workflows for medical imaging, allowing flexible aggregation and accurate reporting of performance across training iterations.
